TopicTitle: Pitch control inverted on medium wings

Articles.Content:
Since the latest patch, the pitch control appears to have been inverted on the medium wings, and if you switch to inverted controls to correct it, roll becomes inverted. Medium wings also appear to be pushing crafts into a gradual roll that needs to be constantly corrected.

To recreate it, make any craft with medium wings. 

Craft file: https://pastebin.com/z5yW3bSQ

Example of roll: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/JCffr-gpqEw
